title: Entertainment News from Pakistan and Around the World
text: People now are more involved in entertainment activates. Their everyday actions are generally connected with entertainment. Today life is full of stress and anxiety and especially in metropolitan cities situation is the most awful, but ARY NEWS website is here with the category to cut the worst part of your life in a new way. ARY NEWS adds salt in your discomfort and distasteful life with daily dose. We provide you live updates on latest bollywood news stories and connect you with your favorite’s celebrities and their lives. The website includes an online showbiz news title, which is updated each day. ARY NEWS gives you information about latest showbiz news, celebrity news, and reviews of the entertainment industry, horoscopes, latest gossips and much more. ARY NEWS is your absolute communication source which provides you information you need in your life.ARY NEWS is your home for all the latest celebrity news, music, fashion, entertainment. Follow your favorite videos and much more only on ARYNEWS.tv.
description: Latest Entertainment news and showbiz buzz from Pakistani Film and TV Industry, gossips, movie reviews, exclusive from around the globe.
